mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pj_googic(googic_no, userid, pic, username, age, location, userphone, useremail, wantjob, telhistory, history, profiletext, possibledate, sido, gugun, dong) values(googic_seq.nextval, #{userid}, #{pic}, #{username}, #{age}, #{location}, #{userphone}, #{useremail}, #{wantjob}, #{telhistory}, #{history}, #{profiletext}, #{possibledate}, #{sido}, #{gugun}, #{dong})
